Class WindowsResourceCompile

  • java.lang.Object

        • org.gradle.language.rc.tasks.WindowsResourceCompile

  • @Incubating
public class WindowsResourceCompile
extends DefaultTask
    Compiles Windows Resource scripts into .res files.
